text: Wang Keying () (born December 1937) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Linxiang, Hunan. He graduated from the Huazhong University of Science and Technology. Wang was the Mayor of Changsha from 1985 to 1990 and CPPCC Committee Chairman of Hunan from 2001 to 2003. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Hunan Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Hunan Category:Mayors of Changsha Category:Vice-governors of Hunan Category:Huazhong University of Science and Technology alumni Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Yueyang
title: Wang Keying
